Milojević: Pokušavam da uspostavim sistem, ne vidim zašto je Totenhem bitniji od Proletera
01 Nov 2019, 14:21 by Zile
Fudbaleri Crvene zvezde naredne nedelje dočekuju Totenhem u Ligi šampiona, a generalnu probu za ovaj duel imaće u Novom Sadu protiv Proletera.
Vladan Milojević je na konferenciji za medije izjavio da je u pitanju disciplinovana i čvrsta ekipa.
– Imamo veoma gust raspored i nemamo mnogo vremena za odmor. U sredu smo igrali sa TSC-om, a već sutra nas čeka duel sa Proleterom. Naš rival je veoma disciplinovana i čvrsta ekipa koja ima zanimljiv spoj mladosti i iskustva. Vidi se po rezultatima da su ušli u dobru formu i da nam neće biti lako u Novom Sadu. Umorni smo, ali to je sport, videću danas na treningu na koga mogu da računam, jer i sa zdravstvenim biltenom imamo određenih problema, rekao je trener Crvene zvezde.
On je dodao da pokušava da uspostavi sistem.
– Pokušavam da uspostavim sistem u kom će svaki igrač znati šta treba da radi. Imamo veliki fond igrača i mogu da kombinujem tako da se to ne oseti na rezultat. Igračima treba kontinuitet da bi ušli u takmičarsku formu i to je ono čemu svaki trener teži. Vodim se filozofijom da je najbolji igrač onaj koji je zdrav. Imamo i problem sa strancima, ali oni to razumeju. Kad neko bude van protokola ne znači da je nešto loše uradio, jednostavno postoji to ograničenje i moramo da uspostavimo balans.
Iako je Zvezda prva na tabeli, Milojević podseća da se računi svode na kraju sezone.
– Videćemo, ne treba ulaziti u euforiju. Čukarički igra sjajno, imaju dobre rezultate i sistem koji grade godinama i to im se pozitivno vraća. Tu je i Partizan koji igra dobro, ali i Radnički i Vojvodina koji su takođe neugodni. Ne treba zaboraviti ni TSC, jer se radi o sjajnoj ekipi. Mi smo u utakmici s njima oborili rekord po broju pretrčanih kilometara i to dovoljno govori o ekipi iz Bačke Topole. Izašli su da se nadigravaju sa nama i mislim da je bila kvalitetna utakmica. Nama je prva sledeća utakmica najbitnija. Ako si profesionalac, onda znaš koji su ti prioriteti. Ne vidim zbog čega je Totenhem bitniji od Proletera. Za mene je titula prioritet, a utakmice u Ligi šampiona su satisfakcija za naš dobar rad, zaključio je Milojević.

Milojevic: I'm trying to establish a system, I don't see why Tottenham is more important than Proleter
01 Nov 2019, 14:21 by Zile
Red Star footballers welcome Tottenham in the Champions League next week, and will have a general rehearsal for this duel in Novi Sad against Proleter.
Vladan Milojevic said at a press conference that he was a disciplined and solid team.
- We have a very dense schedule and we don't have much time to rest. We played with TSC on Wednesday, and tomorrow we have a duel with Proletarian. Our rival is a very disciplined and solid team that has an interesting blend of youth and experience. You can see from the results that they are in good shape and that it will not be easy for us in Novi Sad. We are tired, but it is a sport, I will see today in training that I can count on, because even with the health bulletin we have certain problems, said the Red Star coach.
He added that he was trying to set up the system.
- I'm trying to set up a system where every player will know what to do. We have a large pool of players and I can combine so that it doesn't feel right on the score. Players need continuity to get into competitive form, which is what every coach strives for. I am guided by the philosophy that the best player is the one who is healthy. We also have a problem with strangers, but they understand it. When someone is out of protocol does not mean that they have done something wrong, there is simply a limit and we have to strike a balance.
Although Zvezda is first in the standings, Milojevic reminds that the bills are coming down at the end of the season.
- We'll see, we shouldn't go into euphoria. Cukaricki plays great, they have good results and a system that they have been building for years and this is a positive return. There are also Partizan playing well, but also Radnicki and Vojvodina who are also uncomfortable. TSC should not be forgotten either, as it is a great team. In the match with them, we broke the record for the number of kilometers traveled, and that speaks volumes about the team from Backa Topola. They came out to play with us and I think it was a good game. For us, the first next game is the most important. If you are a professional, then you know what your priorities are. I don't see why Tottenham is more important than Proleter. The title is a priority for me, and the Champions League matches are a pleasure for our good work, Milojevic concluded.
